# Vendor Logos Directory

Place vendor logos here with the following naming convention:
- portnox-logo.png
- cisco-logo.png
- aruba-logo.png
- forescout-logo.png
- extreme-logo.png
- arista-logo.png
- juniper-logo.png
- fortinet-logo.png
- microsoft-logo.png
- packetfence-logo.png
- foxpass-logo.png
- securew2-logo.png
- radius-service-logo.png

Recommended dimensions: 200x60px (PNG with transparent background)
